theory work self

I grew up in rural minnesota hanging out at the gas station, working on cars, buildings rafts, playing world of warcraft. My life approach has been shaped by Plato and the Big Lebowski. I question the world, but the dude always abides. For fun I like to play bass and piano. I find peace in harmony, and beauty in tension. Music has taught me how to listen, to trust my intuition and make mistakes.

The best days of my life are spontaneous. I love staying up late, building stuff, learning new things, making new friends. To me these are the inrgredients that make life magical.
